EmailTemplate.name: KE Registration Pending Notification
EmailTemplate.subject: {!$Organization.Name} - Registration Pending Notification
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Registration__c.Organizer__c},
Thanks for your registration. We have received your request for a scholarship and your registration is currently pending. The education staff will notify you once your request is approved.
Please contact us if you have any questions.
Sincerely, Administration Team
